reviewText: I can not say how important this video has been in my professional development.  Ted Haines shows you everything you need to know to build giant puppets on a budget. Even though some of the materials are virtually impossible to find he shows you in a way that allows you to adapt to your environment,  conditions,  materials and project.  I highly recommend it to any one working to builder large props in the entertainment industry. Please note this video is a 2 disk set and there are two more classes in the completion of the project.  While the first two classes are available on Amazon the third, final, and most vital is not.
